affiliation: Associate Information Consultant, Eli Lilly and Co.
name: Chris Chalfant
biography: Chris Chalfant has worked in Drug Discovery Informatics at Eli Lilly and Company for over ten years as a software developer, system architect, extreme programming project manager and open source evangelist. Previous projects include work on DNA sequencing data management and analysis, cheminformatics analysis portals, high content imaging analysis and, most recently, use of cloud computing to enable scientific research.
